bio: Chainpatrol protects the Optimism Collective by blocking online threats daily
displayName: ChainPatrol - Real Time Security protecting the OP Collective
impactDescription:
Early detection and fast response to online threats across leading Crypto Wallets protects the OP Collective and the wider crypto community from losing millions in digital asset value.

ChainPatrols Platform automates off-chain monitoring, saving the Trust & Safety, and Community moderators time with reporting, and takedown activities.

ChainPatrol is an added defence layer and takedown system mitigating the financial cost and impact of weekly wallet drainer and phishing attacks.

ChainPatrol data protects millions of users through leading crypto wallets. Visitors to the malicious site on both desktop and mobile devices will be shown a warning, within minutes of the threats detection.

ChainPatrol Public Security Portal and Discord Bot make it easy for community members to report threats
contributionDescription:
With the high volume of threats targeting the OP Collective in 2022, ChainPatrol set out to reduce these threats and protect the Optimism community. 

ChainPatrol's solution tracks phishing threats and prevents Optimism users from having their wallets drained.

ChainPatrol started protection for the Optimism Collective in December 2022 and has since blocked 502 Online Threats in Total.

ChainPatrol turned on our auto-detection systems and began reporting malicious URLs to our Wallet Network to have threats blocked in minutes versus days. (Coverage to 30+Million Users of MetaMask, Coinbase Wallet, Phantom, and 20+ Wallets).

ChainPatrol also manages the tracking and full takedown process with domain hosting providers and social platforms;  X/Twitter, Discord, Telegram, YouTube and Reddit.

contributionLinks.description: 🤖 Bot which provides Discord servers with access to ChainPatrol security tools

fundingSources.description: We have not recieved any revenue (First Application)
